altTitles.ja: となりの黒川さん

altTitles.en: My Neighbor Ms. Kurokawa
Kurokawa-san Next to Me

description.en:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret.
description.ja: 僕と彼女の秘密は、些細だけど大切で。大好きな漫画の聖地、それだけが理由で秀美高校に入学した主人公・高橋一。学内はどこに行っても作品に出てきた聖地だらけで大興奮！そんな中、高橋は大好きな作品のヒロインそっくりな美少女・黒川弥生と出会い、とある秘密を共有することに――。不器用な2人が織りなす甘酸っぱくて、ニヤニヤしちゃう青春ラブコメ‼
description.vi: Bí mật giữa mình và cậu ấy tuy bình thường nhưng quan trọng!Hajime Takahashi nhập học tại trường cao trung Shuubi chỉ vì nơi đó là thánh địa trong bộ truyện tranh cậu yêu thích. Tất cả mọi ngóc ngách của trường đều được phác họa trong bộ truyện, điều đó khiến cậu phấn khích tột cùng! Giữa không khí hào hứng, Takahashi gặp một cô gái xinh đẹp giống hệt nữ chính trong tác phẩm yêu thích của mình, Yayoi Kurokawa, và họ đã sẻ chia bí mật của bản thân với nhau.

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

altTitles.en: Lost Letters

altTitles.ja: やぎさん郵便

description.en: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.

altTitles.en: Worst Side Story: Mr. Zetton

altTitles.ja: WORST外伝 ゼットン先生

description.en: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!
description.ru: После долгих лет учёбы Сабуро Ханадзава, также известный как легендарный Зеттон Судзурана, наконец-то стал учителем средней школы. Но в первый же день на работе директор рассказал ему, что на самом деле его наняли не для того, чтобы преподавать, а для того, чтобы заставить учеников вверенного ему класса бросить школу!

title.en: Harem Yori Heion o! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure

altTitles.ja: ハーレムより平穏を！異世界で静かにニート姫させてくれ

altTitles.ja-ro: Harem Yori Heion wo! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure

altTitles.en: More Peace than a Harem: In Another World, Let Me Be a Neet Princess in Peace
I Wish for Peace Instead of a Harem! Let Me Be a NEET Princess Peacefully in Another World

altTitles.es-la: Más paz que un harem - En otro mundo, déjame ser una princesa Nini en paz
En otro mundo, déjame ser una princesa NiNi en paz

description.en:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)
description.ja:
エリートサラリーマン、姫様にTS転生してオナ●ート生活…!!!?

ニートを夢見てFIREをした、エリートサラリーマン・岸辺。夢の生活も目前!! のはずが、車にひかれる寸前だった女の子を助けたことで死亡してしまう。そんな彼を憐れんだ自称神様が岸辺をニートができる異世界へと転生。気づけば超大国の姫様・アイリスになっていた!!! 超絶美少女で一切働く必要がなく、惰眠と自由とオナ●ーのし放題で岸辺は人生勝ち組!! …と確信していたが、ある問題が。この姫様、最高レベルの愛され体質（スキル？）みたいで、色々な女の子が姫様（元男）に迫られまくり……!!?

異世界で愛されまくって働かないメシが上手いか？を体験できる、羨ましすぎる異世界TSクソニートハーレム!!!!

title.en: Ironna Onnano-ko to Kiss wo shiteitara, Yuri-Kiss ni Mezamete shimaimashita…

altTitles.ja: 色んな女の子とキスをしていたら、百合キスに目覚めてしまいました…

altTitles.en: After Kissing Many Girls, I Became a Yuri Kisser...

altTitles.zh: 跟好多妹子亲亲之后，我的百合亲亲意识不小心觉醒了…

description.en:
One day, Higashi Kaede, a first-year high school student who loves helping people, witnesses something falling from the sky. When she went nearby, there was a "girl''!?

"You are my partner!''

Then, she asked me to do something...? There's friendship, effort, and sometimes battle!?
description.ja: 人助けが好きな高校1年生・東楓音は、ある日空から何かが落ちてくるのを目撃する。近くに行ってみると、そこにはーー〝空飛ぶ女の子〟が!?「わたしのパートナーは、あなたに決まりだよっ！」そして、彼女から〝ある〟ことをお願いされて……？友情あり、努力あり、時にバトルあり!?甘くて、すっぱくて、情熱的な〝キス〟あふれるガールズラブコメ、開幕！

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Mitsuki Kou é um jogador PVP tão temido que ganhou o apelido de "Crim, o Caçador de Cabeças" em alguns círculos. Seu próximo jogo para dominar? "Destiny Unchain Online", um novo jogo VRMMO desenvolvido por ninguém menos que o pai de Kou. Mas, nenhum jogo novo no dia do lançamento está livre de bugs - ou seja, Kou sofre um glitch para o meio do nada, e seu avatar de vampiro é transformado em uma garota! Uma história para todos que através dos jogos fizeram novos amigos e miraram no topo... comece!

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: Subete no Jinrui o Hakai Suru. Sorera wa Saisei Dekinai.

altTitles.ja: すべての人類を破壊する。それらは再生できない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Subete no Jinrui wo Hakai Suru. Sorera ha Saisei Dekinai.

altTitles.ja: Destroy all humankind. They can't be regenerated.

altTitles.en: Destroy All Humans. They Can’t Be Regenerated. A Magic: The Gathering Manga
Destroy All Humankind. They Can't Be Regenerated.
Destroy All of Humanity. It Can't Be Regenerated.

altTitles.es-la: Destruye a toda la humanidad. Ellos no pueden regenerarse.

altTitles.ru: Уничтожите всё человечество. Оно не может быть регенерировано.

altTitles.pt-br: Destrua Toda a Humanidade. Eles Não Podem Ser Regenerados.

description.en: This “youth graffiti” manga centers on two people in the 1990s who play the Magic the Gathering trading card game.
description.es-la: El manga de "youth graffiti" se centra en dos personas de los años 90 que juegan al juego de cartas coleccionables Magic the Gathering.
description.pt-br:
Julho de 1999, o mês em que o mundo será destruído segundo Nostradamus. O estudante do fundamental, chamado Hajime, sempre fica atrás de sua rival, a bela Sawatari. Ela não o considera como seu rival, após de ter se introduzido como tal. Ele também é um avido jogador de "Magic: The Gathering". Enquanto ele procura novas cartas ele descobre que a Sawatari também joga MTG, mas escondida. Ela foge após reconhecer ele durante uma partida do card game. No dia seguinte ele desafia ela para um duelo, com um deck especial criado para ganhar dela, prometendo ficar falado e fazer qualquer coisa que ela desejar caso perca. Uma coisa leva a outra e eles finalmente se tornam amigos. Que no fim ele lembra que este era seu objetivo inicial. 

| O título do manga é um trocadilho com a descrição da carta "Cólera de Deus" que é "Destrua todas as criaturas. Elas não podem ser regeneradas." |

altTitles.ja: シガンバナ

description.en:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.
description.pt-br:
Neste país aparentemente pacífico, vive um assassino que caça outros de sua espécie - um assassino de assassinos. Antes de eliminar seus alvos, ele sempre questiona seus motivos para matar - esta é sua maneira de abraçar seu destino.

Do autor de "Until Your Bones Rot" e "The Shadows of Who We Once Were", Utsumi Yae apresenta um drama emocionante sobre as vidas daqueles que vivem no limite entre a vida e a morte.

title.en: Teisou Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebe na Bijo-tachi ni Kakomare nagara Boukensha Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 貞操逆転異世界でスケベな美女たちに囲まれながら冒険者生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Teisou Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebe na Bijo Tachi ni Kakoma re Nagara Bouken Mono Seikatsu
Teisō Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebena Bijo-Tachi ni Kakoma Renagara BōKen-sha Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Chastity reversal: An adventurer's life surrounded by lascivious beauties in a different world
An adventurer's life surrounded by lewd beauties in a chastity-reversed parallel world

description.en:
From Google Translate:

Akira Kusaba is summoned to the other world of Rumisia by the beautiful silver-haired woman Lucia. Akira wasn't summoned to save the world... but to help her make money!? Feeling exhausted, Akira begins working part-time in the other world, but gradually he notices the strangeness of this world. There's a female adventurer who wants to have her breasts wiped by a man, a slime that tries to drain the vitality out of men, and even Lucia, who summoned him, forces him to sleep next to her and secretly enjoys solo play in the bed next to her... Yes, this other world is a world where the concepts of chastity between men and women are reversed!
description.ja: 銀髪の美女ルーシャによって異世界ルミシアへと召喚された草場アキラ。アキラが召喚されたのは世界を救うため……ではなく、金稼ぎの手伝いのため!?脱力しながらも異世界バイト生活を始めたアキラだったが、次第にこの世界のおかしさに気づく。男性におっぱいを拭かれたがる女冒険者に男性の精気を搾り取ろうとするスライム、果ては自分を召喚したルーシャですら、添い寝を強要したり隣のベッドでこそこそソロプレイで気持ちよくなったり――。そう、この異世界は男女の貞操観念が逆転した世界だったのだ！

altTitles.ja: 愛されたがりの白猫ミコさん

altTitles.en: Miko, a White Cat That Wants to Be Loved

description.en: Miko is a white cat who used to be a stray but has since become the most pampered cat in the world! she doesn't care if her owner is working or on a call -- she demands affection at all times.
description.ja:
元野良猫のミコさんは、超がつくほど甘えんぼ。
飼い主が仕事中でも電話中でもいついかなるときも愛されたくて仕方がない…。
そんなミコさんとの愛し愛される相思相愛コミックエッセイ!

title.en: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.ja: 最強スキル「命乞い」で悔しいけど無双しちゃう元魔王様の世界征服活動

altTitles.en: Her Strongest Ability Is Begging for Mercy, the Frustrating World Conquest Adventures of a Former Demon King

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Chinh Phục Thế Giới Đầy Nhục Nhã của Cựu Ma Vương Với Kỹ Năng Thượng Thừa "Cầu Xin Tha Mạng"

description.en:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King. However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
description.ja: 誰からも愛される村娘のチェルシーは、実は転生した元魔王。 しかし、転生の際になぜか魔力もスキルも引き継げず、ただの人間としての生活を強いられることに…。 そんな屈辱の日々が続くある日、村に魔王軍の残党が略奪に現れる。 自分の正体に気づかない元部下に追い詰められ、絶体絶命のピンチに陥るチェルシーだが、ついにそこでスキルが発現！ そのスキルの名は――「命乞い」!?
description.vi: Cựu ma vương khệnh khạng nghĩ là mình sẽ được tái sinh để chiếm lại thế giới nếu như mình có bị đánh bại. Rồi đến lúc đó bị đánh bại thật thì lại được tái sinh thành một con bé dân làng phàm nhân với quả kỹ năng cực kỳ mắm thối...? Nhưng cựu ma vương vẫn quyết tâm chiếm được thế giới bằng bất kỳ mọi giá! Để xem Ma Vương đây sẽ nằm gai nếm mật như nào nhé!

altTitles.ja: くちびるから愛

altTitles.en: Love From Your Lips

description.en:
From Good Girls Scan BL:

Riku, a beloved handyman known throughout the town, struggles with crowds due to his sensitive ears.

After failing his entrance exams for that very reason, the one who supported him was his high school friend, Sumiharu.

Despite being busy running his own business, Riku found comfort in Sumiharu's companionship. However, oneway, during an ordinary phone call, Riku unexpectedly felt aroused just from hearing Sumiharu's voice.

Confused by this sudden change in his feelings, Riku begins to notice that the physical closeness between him and Sumiharu is steadily increasing. What could this mean for their relationship?

――From today onwards, this guy is my bride.

The third son of the prestigious nine-tailed fox family, MItsu
×
The fox caretaker, Tsumugi

One day, due to Mitsu's selfishness, the two, who were once master and servant are now husband and wife…!?
description.ja:
――今日から、こいつを嫁にする。

由緒正しき九尾家の三男坊・三
×
世話係の狐・つむぎ

ある日、三のわがままにより
主従関係だった二人は夫婦に……！？

愛する絵本作家ウマ娘がヒーローだった話

altTitles.en: My Beloved Uma Musume Picture Book Author was a Hero

description.en: She is a picture book author under the pen name "Yoneda Okome", she is the former G1 Uma Musume Rice Shower. One day, she met an active Tracen student topple over due to her abnormal breathing named Kisera Crisis. This chance encounter is what caused the revelation of the Mysterious Man's Plans. And what of the secret of Kisera's Past? Will Rice Shower be a Hero than uncover all of these secrets!?

altTitles.ja: 黒田さんのXXXに触れたら…
アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.en: A hero and a boy who have changed a lot in 20 years

altTitles.ja: 20年で色々変わっちゃった漫画

description.en: Bravely is the hero of justice. 20 years later, he wakes up and finds that he somehow has become a cute girl...?!

altTitles.ja: ロード・エルメロイⅡ世の事件簿

altTitles.en: Lord El-Melloi II Case Files

altTitles.vi: Bí ẩn trong thế giới ma thuật

description.en:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
description.ja: 魔術協会の総本山「時計塔」においてロードに叙されているエルメロイII世は、義妹のライネスから依頼を受け「剥離城アドラ」の遺産相続に立ち会うことに。弟子のグレイを伴い訪れた城で、悲愴な事件が始まる。
description.ru: Часовая Башня — центр магического мира и штаб-квартира «Ассоциации магов», хранящей секреты бесценных таинств. Преподающий здесь лорд факультета современной магии, Эль-Меллой II, по стечению определённых обстоятельств оказывается втянут в борьбу за наследие Замка Разделения, Адра. Только разгадавший тайну ангельских имён, что были даны всем приглашённым и встречаются в нём повсюду, сможет получить его «наследие». Однако даже для высокопоставленных магов Часовой Башни это дело оказалось не простым решением головоломки, а началом волшебного, но в то же время печального инцидента.С этого дела началось досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II, в котором переплелись магия и таинства, иллюзии и загадки...

altTitles.en: Dolls' Frontline

altTitles.ja: ドールズフロントライン

description.en:
Based on the popular mobile strategy game from MICA Team.  
  
In the year 2030, "The Belian Island Incident" happened where a highly radioactive alien substance was accidentally exposed to the atmosphere, causing half the world's population to be killed or mutated into zombie-like creatures called ELID (Euroky Low-Emission Infectious Disease) and the land becoming contaminated and uninhabitable. 

In response to the world suffering a shortage of Manpower, highly advanced androids with superior strength and advanced AI capable of expressing emotions called A-Dolls (Autonomous Dolls) were created.  

When World War 3 broke out in 2045 to 2051 over uncontaminated land and resources, Private Military Companies used A-Dolls with the ability to fight called T-Dolls (Tactical Dolls) in the war, which made them rich, becoming the de facto police and military of many nations after the war ended. 

However, in 2061, T-Dolls of the world's largest PMC, Sangvis Ferri, suddenly rebelled, killed their human masters and attack nearby human settlements. In response, Grifon & Kryuger PMC and their T-Dolls were hired to stop and contain the Sangvis Ferri Forces.

description.en:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

description.fr: Elle se réveille un jour dans son roman préféré. Ce serait l'occasion de briller, sauf qu'on lui a donné un rôle de potiche absolue ! Aucun moyen d'approcher l'héroïne ni les 3 hommes qui lui tournent autour comme des mouches. Pas grave, elle arrivera coûte que coûte à exister ici !
description.id: Aku, bertemu dengan tiga pria ganteng seantero negeri. Putera mahkota, Bangsawan termuda sampai pemilik neraka sihir, Mereka semua mendambakan satu orang perempuan, Evelyn. Dia adalah temanku. Ketiga pria itu mendekati Evelyn dengan cara masing-masing. Lalu aku? Hanya menonton di pojokan saja. Bentar... Sepertinya aku pernah melihat eh maksudku membaca adegan ini.. Apa?! ruapanya aku berada di dalam dunia novel kesukaanku??!!
description.ja: 突然の目眩に襲われて目覚めると愛読していた小説の世界に引き込まれてしまった！？しかも女主人公をいじめる雑魚キャラ「ラテ・アクトリー」に転生…！！ どうせ人生唯一の楽しみである小説がリアルに堪能できれば満足と思いきや… 傍観者でいるつもりがだんだん目立ち始める「ラテ」 果たしてイケメンとの恋は成就するのか…！？
description.ko:
깨어나보니 내가 가장 좋아하는 소설 속에 들어와 버렸다!
그런데 주인공도 악역도 아닌… 눈물 나는 분량의 ‘들러리’라고?

현실에 치여사는 스물 다섯 학원 강사 김혜정! 그런데 즐겨 읽던 소설 <야수의 꽃> 세계로 떨어져 소설 속 인물 ‘라테 엑트리’가 된다.

…그런데 기왕 들어오게 해 준거 소설 속 미남들과 썸 좀 타는 주인공이 되게 해주지. 
여주인공을 괴롭히다 털릴 예정의 조연 라테 엑트리가 되어버리다니! 
에휴~ 그러면 그렇지 내 팔자야.

그래, 기왕 이렇게 된 거 열심히 구경이나 하자!
어차피 소설 보는 재미로 살아왔던 인생! 소설이 눈앞에서 실현된다는데 어찌 마다하겠는가! 
팝콘이나 먹으며 구경하지 뭐. 와작!

그런데 조연이었던 라테는 오히려 소설 속에서 자신의 존재감을 점점 내보이게 되는데…? 
소설 속의 들러리양의 파란만장한 구경기가 시작된다!
description.zh: 一睁开眼…竟然穿越到了我最近在追的小说里？可是为啥不按套路出牌，没有女主命的我竟然穿越到一个没有一丁点戏份的悲催小配角身上？事已至此我还是努力给自己加戏吧！抢在女主出场前跟三个男主来一场完美的邂逅，实现穿越人生的逆袭之路！
description.pt-br: Hyejung adorava ler novels para fugir do estresse diário. Isso era antes dela acordar dentro do mundo estranho de sua comic favorita! Só tem um detalhe, ao invés dela acordar como a heroína da história que é cortejada pelos três melhores galãs, agora ela é Latte Ectrie, uma vilã secundária que geral odeia. De uma forma ou de outra, agora ela tem a chance de assistir a sua comic favorita de camarote com muita pipoca. Mas... É impressão ou a narrativa está tomando um rumo meio... Diferente?

The Most Luxurious Son-in-Law: Dragon King's Palace

description.en: I am nothing in the eyes of others; my mother-in-law despises me, thinking I just rely on my wife and spend her money. And then there’s a group of lowlifes who are constantly coveting my wife. Who says a man marrying into his wife’s family can’t rise to greatness? Ji Xueyu! From now on, I’ll be the one to protect you
description.vi: Ta chẳng là gì trong mắt người khác, mẹ vợ khinh thường vì nghĩ ta ăn bám vợ, tiêu tiền của vợ. Ngoài ra còn có một lũ cặn bã luôn thèm muốn vợ ta. Ai nói là vào cửa nhà vợ thì không thể bay lên 9 tầng mây? Kỷ Tuyết Vũ! Sau này sẽ do ta bảo vệ em

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
僕のカノジョ先生

altTitles.en: My Teacher-Girlfriend

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái tôi là cô giáo

description.en: Can sensei be the heroine? Please?    Due to a traumatic experience, I have a distrust of people called "sensei". I, Saigi Makoto, was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school, Fujiki Maka-sensei. "I... love you" Eh– a confession out of the blue!? "Until you say you love me, I will continue to pursue you." Ever since then, I've been called by for "guidance counselling" after school, somehow watched AV together, being given excessive skin-ship, went on dates together. Over time, I gradually became conscious of Sensei...? But isn't it bad for Sensei to go out with her student? Lesson start!
description.ja: 過去のトラウマが原因で“先生”と呼ばれる人が嫌いな彩木慎は、校内一の美人教師・藤城真香に呼び出される。二人きりの生徒指導室、神妙な面持ちの先生が発したのは「わたしは、君が好きです」まさかの告白で…!?
description.pt-br: Devido a uma experiência traumática, eu nunca mais confiei em pessoas com o título de “professor”. Certo dia eu, Saigi Makoto, fui chamado depois da aula pela professora mais bela de toda a escola, Fujiki Maka-sensei, para de repente ela se confessar do nada e falar que continuará me perseguindo até eu disser que sim!

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.ja: 火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
description.vi:
Truyện kể về thời kỳ Tam quốc tranh bá nổi tiếng trong lịch sử Trung Quốc. Điểm đặc biệt ở đây là nhân vật trung tâm của truyện không phải là Tào Tháo, Lưu Bị hay Tôn Quyền như ta thường thấy ở các bộ truyện nói về thời kì này mà là Tư Mã Ý - người mà sau này đã cùng với gia tộc mình đánh bại tất cả các anh hùng khác, gom thiên hạ về thành 1 mối, chấm dứt 1 thời kỳ dài loạn lạc. 

Truyện mở đầu bằng cơn ác mộng mà Tư Mã Ý vẫn thường gặp: 1 người đàn ông trên ngai vàng phế truất ngôi vị của hoàng đế, bên ngoài bất chấp đám đông binh lính bao vây tấn công cùng bao nhiêu thương tích mà 1 người bình thường không thể chịu đựng nổi, tên tù vượt ngục vẫn bước từng bước từng bước một vào điện đòi món nợ máu với người đàn ông đó. Đó chỉ là cơn ác mộng hay là 1 điềm báo? Không ai nói được kể cả Tư Mã Ý.

Nhưng cũng có ai có thời gian để quan tâm đến truyện ấy trong thời loạn lạc này chứ. Dù cố né tránh, cuối cùng dòng họ Tư Mã cũng phải bước vào vòng xoáy chiến tranh, và sự xuất hiện của họ đã làm thay đổi cả dòng lịch sử....

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

description.en: A new infection has spread around the planet, that turns people into undead. The story begins a few minutes before the first recorded case, and shows the struggle of six young to survive this new world.
description.es: Uma nova infecção se espalhou pelo planeta, que transforma as pessoas em mortos-vivos. A história começa alguns minutos antes do primeiro caso registrado, e mostra a luta de seis jovens para sobreviver à esse novo mundo.
description.it: Una nuova infezione si è diffusa in tutto il pianeta, trasformando le persone in non morti. La storia inizia pochi minuti prima dello scoppiare dell'epidemia e mostra la lotta di sei studenti delle scuole superiori che cercano di sopravvivere in questo nuovo mondo.

altTitles.en: Wondercat Kyuu-chan

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

altTitles.en: Raised by Villains

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

title.en: I Really Don't Want to Be Reborn

altTitles.en: I Really Don't Want to Remake

altTitles.vi: Ta Không Muốn Trùng Sinh Đâu

description.en:
Little had I known, I Chen Hansheng; the former elite of society and a Diamond Bachelor, was reborn. When I woke up, I was a senior graduate in high school? 
Later, Chen Hansheng was walking near the crosswalk, he seemed hesitant. A precious girl; Shen Youchu and two other girls; Bai Yueguang and Xiao Rongyu, who will he pick? All of them? One of them? Two of them? Read to find out. 

Side Note:  Diamond Bachelor is a slang word that means someone who’s insanely rich and single.

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

altTitles.pt-br: Como A Vilã, Criar Uma Protagonista Yandere É Normal, Não É?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Shen Wei E Yi Nv Pei De Wo Yang Cheng Bìng Jiao Nv Zhu Hen Zheng Chang Ba?!

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
description.pt-br:
Jiang Yang é a diretora de designe de arte de um jogo, ao coletar referências para uma nova produção, cai de um penhasco e acaba atravessando para um mundo de cultivo. Para voltar ao seu mundo original, Jiang Yang se dedica ao cultivo e finalmente está prestes a ascender como uma divindade para retornar. No entanto, devido a uma misteriosa linha do destino, ela é forçada a ser puxada para um mundo de magia (que também é um jogo otome, e o jogo acabou de começar). Nesse novo mundo, ela encontra a protagonista do jogo, Xing Lu, sendo intimidada pela vilã secundária logo no início da academia de magia.

Jiang Yang percebe que este é o jogo problemático que a fez atravessar os mundos originalmente. Sua linha do destino está ligada a Xing Lu, a protagonista do jogo. Jiang Yang acredita que, seguindo a história do jogo até o fim, ela poderá retornar ao seu mundo real. No entanto, conforme o jogo se desenvolve, Jiang Yang relembra as tramas ridículas escritas pelo roteirista idiota do jogo. Vendo o sofrimento de Xing Lu, a fortemente responsável e moralmente íntegra Jiang Yang decide ajudar Xing Lu. Ela não apenas ajuda a livrar Xing Lu dos pretendentes indesejados, incluindo o príncipe mulherengo, mas também lhe ensina técnicas de cultivo para que ela possa se defender dos outros estudantes. Às vezes, isso até envolve sacrificar-se fisicamente! 

À medida que Jiang Yang e Xing Lu se tornam mais próximas, Jiang Yang descobre que sua linha do destino com Xing Lu é mais complexa do que ela imaginava...

altTitles.ja: 魔女は満月に咲く

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

altTitles.en: Tales Of Akane
Akane Story

description.en:
Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. 
Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. 
Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br:
Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. 
Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. 
Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: 《魔力無限》のマナポーター ～パーティの魔力を全て供給していたのに、勇者に追放されました。魔力不足で聖剣が使えないと焦っても、メンバー全員が勇者を見限ったのでもう遅い～

altTitles.en: Manaporter of 《InfiniteMagic》

description.en:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!
description.ja: 生まれ持った無限の魔力で、マナポーターとして勇者パーティ全員の魔力供給を担ってきたイシュア。だが彼は、ある日突然、理不尽な理由でパーティを追放されてしまう。落胆するイシュアのもとに、彼を追ってきたパーティ仲間の聖女アリアの姿が。実は追放は勇者の独断で、彼女はイシュアが自分たちを見捨てたと思い、連れ戻しに来たのだった。真実を知ったアリアはパーティ脱退を決意し、イシュアは彼女と二人で旅を始めることになる。追放された最強マナポーターと、彼を追放した勇者。二人の対照的な冒険が今始まる!!

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

altTitles.fr: Not So Bad to Be Bad!

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

altTitles.ja: 瀬戸さんを笑わせたい紬ちゃん

altTitles.en: Tsumugi-chan Wants to Make Seto-san Laugh

description.en:
Seto-san is a beautiful and cool class president. Her smiling face must be absolutely wonderful. I want to see it! 

This is a short comic in which Tsumugi-chan, a ditzy girl with whom Seto-san has had a little bit of contact with since the entrance ceremony, boldly tries various strategies to make Seto-san laugh — but usually fails. However, there seems to be something quite interesting about Seto-san...
description.ja: キレイでかっこいい学級委員長の瀬戸さん。笑った顔はきっと素敵なはず。……見たい！ 入学式のときからちょっと接点があったドジっ子の紬ちゃんが、果敢に瀬戸さんを笑わそうと多彩な作戦を繰り出して失敗するショートコミック。……なのだけど、瀬戸さんの様子がどうもおかしい！！！！

title.en: The Devil Who Kisses My Feet

altTitles.en: The Demon Who Kisses My Foot

description.en:
Maria, who is in an unhappy marriage with her sadistic husband, unexpectedly receives news. Lowell, her husband's half-brother, had returned from the battlefield.

 Maria, who had personally educated and raised him, learned that he  was no longer the small child or immature boy Maria remembered. He had the appearance of a grown man. 

With his appearance, a rift slowly began to appear in the seemingly peaceful Marquis Redford.

Where would this relationship, which should never have begun, end?
description.pl: Kiedy młoda Maria zostaje wydana za mąż za Jacquesa Redforda, bogatego szlachcica, jest wdzięczna, że wydaje się on być łagodny i wyrozumiały. Jednak posiadłość Redfordów skrywa mroczne sekrety, a życie Marii zmienia się na gorsze, gdy na jaw wychodzą sadystyczne upodobania jej męża. Nie mając nikogo, na kim mogłaby się oprzeć, Maria znajduje pocieszenie w towarzystwie nieślubnego przyrodniego brata Jacquesa, Lowella. Teraz, gdy Lowell wrócił do domu jako bohater wojenny, czy może uratować Marię przed jej okrutnym losem?

title.en: Demon Slayer - Kono Futari Fukakouryoku ni Tsuki (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing: Tomioka Giyuu x Shinazugawa Sanemi

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.ja: よぅ、アクアリスト

altTitles.en: Hey, Aquarist

description.en: A delinquent boy was out at a festival when he finds a discarded goldfish. Recalling his childhood experience of buying a goldfish from a festival stall and bringing it home only to have it die, he tries to make up for it by releasing the goldfish into the river. However, a mysterious girl stops him and tells him that it is not allowed to let out goldfish into the wild, and he learns how to keep goldfish at home and becomes a proper "aquarist."
description.ja: 見た目は派手だが根は優しいテツオは祭の最中、ゴミ箱に無造作に捨てられている金魚を拾う。川に逃がそうとしたその時、謎の和服美少女・カナデがその行為にまったをかける――！アクアリストのカナデと出会い、テツオは金魚を飼うことを決意する。だが、思っていたよりも金魚を飼うことは大変で――!?
description.ru: Тэцуо — парень с вызывающей внешностью, но очень добрым сердцем. Однажды он попал на фестиваль, где находит выброшенных золотых рыбок. Когда же Тэцуо собрался выпустить их в реку, он замечает девушку...
description.es-la: Tetsuo un chico bastante llamativo, pero que en el fondo es alguien amable, recoge unos peces dorados que fueron tirados a la basura durante un festival; mientras intentaba liberarlos en el rio... ¿¡Se encontró con una solitaria y hermosa chica!?

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Kishi wa, Kanarazu Shinu Heroine wo Sukuu Tame Isekai Demo Saikyou no Kishi to Naru ~Ryoutei ni Hana wo, Ryoute ni Ken wo~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の騎士は、必ず死ぬヒロインを救うため異世界でも最強の騎士となる ～両手に花を、両手に剣を～

altTitles.en: The Strongest Knight in the World, in an Attempt to Save the Heroines Who Were Destined to Die, Decided to Become the Strongest in Another World as Well ~ Flowers in Both Hands, Swords in Both Hands ~

description.en:
He who fell in love with the heroine overturned her destiny to save her from her timely demise.

Abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitude—a young boy named Mikazuki Kenya.

At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming.

A meeting with “Kaguya” and “Reina,” the heroines from the immensely popular game “Knight of Giant.”

The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them.

However, in the story, one of them is destined to die…

To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world.

Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of “Knight of Giant”?!

The strongest gamer embarks on a heroic tale of becoming the strongest in another world, in order to save the heroines he fell deeply in love with. The story begins.
description.ja:
ガチ恋したヒロインを救うため運命を覆せ！

両親に捨てられ、高校では虐められ、孤独となった少年・御剣剣也。絶望の淵に居た時、唯一の趣味であるVRゲームで運命の出会いを果たす。それは、大人気ゲーム『Knight of Giant』のヒロイン「かぐや」と「レイナ」。二人のヒロインと過ごす時間が彼を救い、二人ともにガチ恋した。しかし、彼女たちはストーリーの中でどちらかが必ず死ぬ運命・・・そんな運命を変えるため、世界最強となるまで人生を捧げてゲームを極めた末に、突如、剣也は『Knight of Giant』の世界に入り込んでしまう――!?

altTitles.ja: アリスさんちの囲炉裏端

altTitles.th: มื้ออุ่นหน้าเตาแห่งบ้านคุณอลิซ

altTitles.en: By The Hearth At Alice-san's Home
By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House

description.en:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
description.pt-br: Depois de 10 anos, Alice volta de Tóquio para a sua cidade natal e mora sozinha em uma antiga casa tradicional Japonesa com lareira. Harumi, um amigo de infância, estava animado para se encontrar novamente depois de muito tempo, mas o calor da lareira com Alice continua tão quente quanto no passado...

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

altTitles.en: Misaki-kun is Unobtainable

altTitles.ja-ro: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara ja Nai

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

altTitles.en: Fate Rewinder
All Great Achievements Require Time

description.en: An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case!
description.ja: 悲運の死を遂げた人々を救う組織、時空警察特殊機動隊、通称「巻戻士」！彼らの武器は右眼に埋め込まれたタイムマシン「リトライアイ」！事件を解決するまで何十回、何百回、何千回と時を巻き戻す！
description.vi: Biệt đội cơ động cảnh sát thời không, hay còn gọi tắt là "Cảnh sát thời gian" (Người tua ngược/Rewinder) là một tổ chức giải cứu những người có cái chết bất đắc kì tử! Họ sử dụng một cỗ máy thời gian ở mắt phải "Retry Eye"! Những cảnh sát thời gian có thể quay ngược thời gian hàng chục, hàng trăm tới hàng nghìn lần cho đến khi phá được vụ án! Bộ truyện từng lập kỷ lục suốt 1 năm liền đứng đầu liên tục trong danh sát truyện yêu thích của tạp chí Corocoro Comic.

title.en: Do you like a baby-faced boss?

altTitles.ja: 童顔な上司は好きですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Dougan na Joushi wa suki desu ka?

altTitles.vi: Em có thích một cấp trên mặt búng ra sữa không?

description.en: A romantic comedy story between a baby-faced boss and a mature subordinate.
description.ja: 童顔上司と貫禄女子の凸凹ラブコメ

description.en:
Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.
